message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.
I understand your perspective, Alice. Given the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer the product to you for $12500. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11500 for the product.

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go above $13500. I'll make one more compromise, and offer the product to you for $13000. This is my final offer, so let me know if this is something you'd be willing to accept.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12500 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $13000, Bob. However, I'm willing to throw in some additional perks to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 6-month warranty and a complimentary maintenance package. The price remains at $13000. This is my last offer, so let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While the additional perks are appreciated, I am unable to accept $13000 for the product. I will instead purchase the product from John for $15000.
